channel.title: Development on Michele Schimd
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Michele Schimd

item.title: Software development
item.description: Development is a generic term including many aspects of software production, in this lecture, wer are going to discuss some of these aspects

item.title: Programming languages
item.description: The programming language is an important aspect of software development, today there are thousand of languages each with pros and cons. This lecture discusses the most popular programming languages as well as their usage in software development.

item.title: Development Tools
item.description: When developing an application, the language and its ecosystem are not the only aspect to consider. In this lecture we discuss development tools which are those tools allowing developers to perform their job efficiently and effectively.
